body:
@kubernetes/goog-ux I can provide the exact rc if you need a better repro. 

```
$ kubectl rolling-update glbc --container l7-lb-controller --image=gcr.io/google_containers/glbc:0.5.6 

panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal 0xb code=0x1 addr=0x20 pc=0x760287]

goroutine 1 [running]:
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/runtime.Encode(0x0, 0x0, 0x7f992630d470, 0xc820020f00, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, ...)

k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api.HashObject(0x7f992630d470, 0xc820020f00, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
    /usr/local/google/home/beeps/goproj/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/api/helpers.go:157 +0xb2
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl.CreateNewControllerFromCurrentController(0x7f992630f410, 0xc82029d5a0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x15f9898, 0x7, 0x7ffd7dfadce4, 0x4, 0x0, 0x0, ...)

    /usr/local/google/home/beeps/goproj/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/rollingupdate.go:253 +0x422c
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd.NewCmdRollingUpdate.func1(0xc8202b0400, 0xc8202ac640, 0x1, 0x4)
    /usr/local/google/home/beeps/goproj/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/rollingupdate.go:87 +0x7d

    /usr/local/google/home/beeps/goproj/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/spf13/cobra/command.go:618 +0x2d
k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kubectl/app.Run(0x0, 0x0)
```

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Highest priority. Must be actively worked on as someone's top priority right now.
labels.name: priority/critical-urgent

title: kubectl rolling-update nil pointer dereference
